Text: Ubile̩ i mʼumi du wʼalaku, owñ chʼalaku ki akpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu.
E̩ la go, ojima O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩na olodudu awa; omuko̩la-wñ dab ekuku omi ki nana; ane̩-ile̩ la ade̩ ñaña noji ojima-wñ,
I la dab ane̩ ego kʼu li le̩, owñ chʼalu kʼane̩ ego de̩ kʼu li e̩gba kʼu wa kʼu fʼewo-i kpabie̩; ane̩ ego ojoji ojoji kʼu li la dab ane̩ ego kʼu li o̩la aji Che̩bar le̩; tak u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Oñ ojima Jihofa wʼef unyi le̩ lʼo̩na alaku ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu.
Tak Afu mʼumi du kwane̩, oñ i mʼumi du wʼef anuku; e̩ la go, ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ unyi le̩.
Tak u gbo abu kʼe̩ne̩ʼka dʼef unyi le̩ ako̩la ñwu mi; e̩ne̩ʼka la lewa dago kpenyʼumi;

oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, uña ede-mi de̩, kpʼugbo kʼu nadʼadaba e̩re̩-mi tʼo̩ i che, ugbo kʼu nagugu alumeji amo̩ma Israe̩l ogbegbele̩; abunyi Israe̩l ñʼanʼabutabu-ma kpʼoku amonu oj otete otete-ma dʼodu-mi kiafo̩ ji ge̩ n, tʼama tʼamonu-ma.

Owñ chʼugbo ku ma fʼajita alugbo̩na-ma che kpenyʼajita alugbo̩na e-mi, ku ma la kʼoli ona-ma gwanyi kpenyʼoli o̩na e-mi kʼo̩do okate tʼagbagba mi kpʼama; ma la nʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma ku ma che fʼodu-mi kiafo̩ daji; todule̩ oñ omi fʼuma lie̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi.
Fai ama ki mʼabutabu-ma kpai oku amonu-ma ko bʼumi o̩la te̩ rʼo̩najiji, tak omi agugu alumeji-ma ogbegbele̩.
Uwe̩, o̩ma one̩, dʼunyi-iña abunyi Israe̩l kʼanyo̩ udu ku ma fe̩ ki mu ma. E̩ naje̩ ñwu ma fʼe̩wñ uwo̩li-wñ-i ñwa.

I la che̩wñ kʼanyo̩ e̩wñ du ku ma che le̩ fʼuma mu, mak e̩ je̩ ñwu ma ma alu kʼunyi le̩ de̩ eju, kpai alu kʼe̩wñ chʼe̩te̩ru jʼef uwñ, kpʼo̩na aledufu-wñ kpʼo̩na egudu nyʼejefu-wñ kpʼalu kʼi ade̩ eju chaka, kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ chaka kpʼalu du ki ade̩ eju chaka kpʼuko̩-o̩la-wñ chaka, kʼe̩ fʼu ko̩ eju-ma; kʼama ki de o̩gbo̩-wñ du yiili chaka, kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ chaka, ku ma che teju-wñ.
E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩-o̩la unyi le̩ de̩ kakini, oj uwo-i ugbo tʼugbo du ki te̩ kade dagbala daka afo̩ e-efo̩; e̩ go, uko̩-o̩la unyi le̩ de̩.

E̩ñwa ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ de̩, ohibo̩wo̩ ohibo̩wo̩, (ohibo̩wo̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ʼka nyʼo̩gaba). Ofe-wñ achʼohibo̩wo̩ ʼka unabe̩-wñ la achʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ʼka, oñ oli ku ma be̩ tʼiba-wñ lale achʼo̩gabaʼka; ubi ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ de̩.
Akwo ofe-wñ ane̩pe̩te̩ kad e̩bale-wñ o̩gane̩ achʼohibo̩wo̩ meji, unabe̩-wñ la achʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka; oñ akwo e̩bale-wñ ki nya le̩ kad e̩bale-wñ ki nana chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka.
Ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ate̩ achʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; oñ akwʼugbo ku ma kʼuna jo̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ kpʼate̩ tʼate̩-wñ igba me̩le̩ ajo̩.
Ujiji ugbo ku ma akʼuna oji-wñ le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gweji, unabe̩-wñ laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gweji ge̩; o̩wo̩-wñ me̩le̩ e̩le̩ chʼokujo̩.

Ujiji e̩bale-wñ achʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩le̩, unabe̩-wñ laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩le̩, o̩wo̩ me̩le̩le̩-wñ. E̩be̩ tʼo̩ u la achʼukpe̩reji ohibo̩wo̩-ñw ʼka ofe-wñ la achʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka aledaka. Ate̩gu ubo̩-wñ la akpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, E̩wñ uhio̩me̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ ku ma che de̩, ku ma kʼe̩wñ wa gujo oji-wñ, ku me̩ la fʼe̩bie̩ ta fiʼo̩.
Uwe̩ adʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ ñw amatama abo Lifaiku ma chʼugbe̩ Zedo̩k, ku ma me̩ru mi ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi, ku ma mʼudu che iche̩bo̩ adure, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak uwe̩ ache e̩bie̩-wñ, kʼe̩ dʼu kado igba-wñ me̩le̩ kpʼoji alo e̩bale-wñ me̩le̩ kpʼoji e̩wñ ku ma be̩ tʼo̩ daka. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ agwʼo rinyo̩, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod uwñ.
E̩ ki ño̩ mʼo̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ du, ku ma fʼu gujo ugbo ku ma fudate̩ ugbo unyi le̩ ejo̩do̩da uña kiafo̩.
Tak O̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ uwe̩ adʼo̩mʼobuko̩ ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo n wa che iche̩bo̩ adure ge̩. Tak ama agwʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ rinyo̩, alu ku ma nʼo̩kokuno̩ le̩ gwʼo rinyo̩.
E̩gbakʼe̩ fʼu gworinyo̩ kpa, tak uwe̩ anʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ kʼi ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n, kpʼokolo ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini wa.
E̩ ki la ko ma wʼo̩gba Jihofa anane̩, tak amatama abʼomu rʼuma o̩la, oñ ma ako ma chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ egu-jo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
O̩jo̩ mebie uwe̩ añwʼobuko̩ che kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure o̩jo̩ ñwa o̩jo̩ ñwa; ma ñʼañwʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ kpʼokolo kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma ma ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n che.
Ama ki che e̩wñ e̩boma todu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ mebie, tak i afe̩, ki te̩ ñw e̩wñ O̩jo̩ kate.
E̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-wñ jo̩ kpa, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ, kpʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, amatama, akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-me̩ kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-me̩ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-i. Tak u nagba me̩, Ondu Jihofa aka-i.
